command: tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You made a wild Anomalocaris trust you! Keep feeding it every once in a while to eventually tame it!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"Your taming progress has been reset!"}]}
tellraw @p {"rawtext":[{"text":"You have succesfully tamed an Anomalocaris!"}]}
ride @e[c=1, r=5, type=!rift:anomalocaris, type=!player] summon_ride rift:anomalo_carry_stuff
ride @e[c=1, r=5, type=!rift:anomalocaris, type=!player] summon_ride rift:anomalo_carry_stuff
